meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: 제가 뭐 깜빡하거나 잊어버렸을 때 챙겨주면 좋아요. Like, someone who cares me when I forget things a lot. 듣기 View video BRAVE Entertainment : 브레이브걸스의 유후 뮤직비디오 비하인드 스토리
vlive.english: Like, someone who cares me when I forget things a lot.

그냥 끊어버렸네? He just hung up. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊

examples.korean: If you’ve forgotten your login ID, click this link. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 로그인 비밀번호를 잊어버렸을 경우에는 이 링크를 클릭하세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: As likely as not she’s forgotten all about it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 십중팔구 그녀가 그것에 대해 다 잊어버렸을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As likely as not she’s forgotten all about it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don’t worry—they could have just forgotten to call. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 걱정하지 마. 그들이 그냥 전화 거는 걸 잊어버렸을 수도 있어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t worry—they could have just forgotten to call. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Are you sure you locked the gate? You could easily have forgotten. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 현관문 잠근 것 확실하니? 네가 필시 잊어버렸을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Are you sure you locked the gate? You could easily have forgotten. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: From past experience I’d say he’d probably forgotten the time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이전의 경험으로 볼 때 그가 아마 시간을 잊어버렸을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: From past experience I’d say he’d probably forgotten the time. Add to Wordbook
